timeline.message:
Update dependencies

- Dropwizard 2.0.11 -> 2.0.12
- gRPC 1.30.2 -> 1.31.0
- Micrometer 1.5.2 -> 1.5.3, 1.3.10 -> 1.3.11
- Reactor 3.3.7 -> 3.3.8
- Brave 5.12.3 -> 5.12.4
- Jetty 9.4.30 -> 9.4.31
- Spring Boot 2.3.1 -> 2.3.2
- Shaded:
  - fastutil 8.3.1 -> 8.4.0
- Build:
  - Checkstyle 8.34 -> 8.35
  - Finagle ServerSets 20.6.0 -> 20.7.0
  - Mockito 3.4.4 -> 3.4.6

timeline.author: ikhoon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -164,14 +164,14 @@ com.typesafe.akka:
 # Finagle is used only for testing in zookeeper module.
 com.twitter:
   finagle-serversets_2.13:
-    version: '20.6.0'
+    version: '20.7.0'
 
 gradle.plugin.net.davidecavestro:
   gradle-jxr-plugin: { version: '0.2.1' }
 
 io.dropwizard:
   dropwizard-core:
-    version: &DROPWIZARD_VERSION '2.0.11'
+    version: &DROPWIZARD_VERSION '2.0.12'
     javadocs:
     - https://www.javadoc.io/doc/io.dropwizard/dropwizard-core/2.0.11/

timeline.bodyText:
Don't we need to upgrade to 2.1.16?
https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/releases/tag/v2.1.16.RELEASE
timeline.author: ikhoon

timeline.message: Address the comments from @ikhoon / Fix compilation errors / Remove unnecessary Javadoc links

timeline.bodyText: @heowc You might be interested in this 😉
timeline.author: trustin

replies.bodyText:
I think this is a side effect due to a problem from before it was created.
The current Spring-related dependency is looking at 2.x, not 1.5.x. I don't know when this has been done, but it has been going on before and the tests I've written passed normally.
This means that with the addition of these lines, the dependencies have returned to normal and the problem has only come to light. I think I should definitely fix this. WDYT?
replies.author: heowc

replies.bodyText: Yep, that's correct. We can fix this by providing string-to-duration converter for older spring boot.
replies.author: trustin

replies.bodyText: I will make a separate PR and fix it. 😭
replies.author: heowc
